reviewText: Arrived quickly and just as described.
I can add nothing else to this. A classic is a classic and Im happy to own these classics together in a blu-ray package.
Dont make them like these anymore, Heston was an actor who could portray a character of any century. Classic films the whole family should watch, put away the cell phones and enjoy.

I have wanted to purchase them for years, but never got around to doing until lately.  I have enjoyed watching them.  I plan to order
Samson & Delilah, The Robe, and Cleopatra.  I hope I can get a good deal on those as well.  I have no complaints.

2 of my favorite movies in one combo pack!  Having then in BLU-RAY! AMAZING!  I actually saw things in the movie that i had never noticed before because of the picture quality.  Delivery was fast and on time.  Very happy.
Cool!  Great to see the old classics in high def without having to pay extra from DircTV!
